offers.shortContent: 100% cashback on QR payment through the entire month (up to Tk. 5000, 1 person per hour)
offers.conditions: • Purchase must be made via scanning merchant QR code from CashBaba wallet. </br> • The cashback amount will be up to Tk. 5000 (1 person per hour) and the winner will be notified via app notification. </br> • The offer is valid till 30th April, 2021.</br> • For any query or complaint, please contact our hotline 09666777245. </br> • All rights reserved by Recursion FinTech Limited [CashBaba].

offers.shortContent: 100% cashback on mobile recharge (up to 100, 1 person per hour)
offers.conditions: • Mobile recharge must be done by CashBaba wallet. </br> • The cashback amount will be up to Tk. 100 (1 person per hour) and the winner will be notified via app notification.</br> • The offer is valid till 30th April, 2021.</br> • For any query or complaint, please contact our hotline 09666777245. </br> • All rights reserved by Recursion FinTech Limited [CashBaba].

offers.shortContent: Get 1 attractive smartphone at every month end.
offers.conditions: • Transect as much as you can from CashBaba wallet to avail this offer (amount for “Add Money” & “Send Money” is excluded)</br> • The highest spender will get 1 smart phone at every month end and the winner will be notified via app notification.</br> • In case of multiple winners, the final winner will be decided by lottery. </br> • The offer is valid till 31st Dec, 2022. </br> • For any query or complaint, please contact our hotline 09666777245. </br> • All rights reserved by Recursion FinTech Limited [CashBaba].
